modName: Far Off ENB - Claymay - Performance Version
summary: A lore friendly and performance friendly ENB config based on the stylized concept of making Skyrim look more like a claymation, miniature, or diorama.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#00ff00][size=4][center]For the darker nights version of this mod, please visit my blog.
All updates will be posted on my blog going forward. Thank you for your continued support and enthusiasm!

[url=http://faroffmods.blogspot.com/]faroffmods[/url][/center][/size][/color][/b][/center]

[center][b]A special thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/366954/?]wolfgrimdark for showcasing my ENB on Nexus[/url] and [url=https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.256334781202175.1073741885.125784290923892&type=1]Facebook[/url]
[/b][/center]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3807/12096434064_dd99c2b639_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][youtube]tdy62IMw8aU[/youtube][/center]
[center][youtube]8Tko8dEzJi0[/youtube][youtube]x1RsuE-4i8o[/youtube]
[youtube]LOZVSpyHX3w[/youtube][youtube]JxJ77ZTwHoM[/youtube][youtube]hMFYOhtDfao[/youtube][youtube]ak7aoAxVtts[/youtube][youtube]MoPQNgsgNMA[/youtube][youtube]e5zmnaC2RuU[/youtube][/center]

[center][b]Special thanks to hodilton for the video![/b][/center]
[center][youtube]u9qtLCLZmf4[/youtube][/center]

[color=#008000][b]Quick background on me and ENB...[/b][/color]
=============
I'm the creator of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/157012/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Far Off ENB[/url]
[url=http://faroffmods.blogspot.com/]My blog page[/url] contains many presets for anyone who is interested in looking and trying.

Check out my other ENB presets here on Nexus:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56548/?]Far Off ENB - Nirn (Pure Weather and ELFX ready)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56727/?]Far Off ENB - Nirn - For COT and ELFX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50764/?]Far Off ENB - CGI Series[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50500/?]Far Off ENB - The Pacific Northwest[/url]

This version of Claymay ENB is very FPS friendly and should run for almost all players. The only effects which are active and required for this config to appear as my screenshots are Detailed Shadows , Sun Glare , Sun Rays and Depth Of Field. I've tweaked lighting and shadows to create a fake looking SSAO effect. This means you get the look of SSAO without the performance hit. This config is Anti-Aliasing friendly. You may use hardware Anti-Aliasing if you prefer.


[color=#008000][b]REQUIRED:[/b][/color]
=============
For Claymay version 1.5.1 the v0.250 ENB binary is required. [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0250.htm]Get it here[/url] - (You only need the d3d9.dll file)

All past Claymay versions, use this binary -
[url=https://www.mediafire.com/?k3ka4c0s885nm7z]ENB Binary v0.244[/url][b](You only need the d3d9.dll file)[/b]

[b][color=#ff0000]Be sure to grab the particle patch file in the optional category in the downloads section of this mod page.[/color][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49472/?]Realistic Nights[/url] by Mountain Fisherman.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face light by tktk1[/url] is highly recommended for character and followers.

[color=#008000][b]RECOMMENDED FILES:[/b][/color]
========
I use these files when I want a really good looking Vanilla game...

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48526/?]SkyRealism - Shiny by MTichenor[/url](Use for vanilla textures only)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50638/?]Post-Process Effects Addon by ZeroKing[/url]
[url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1908]Skyrim Snow FX for ENB by Mindflux[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5307/?]Yuril Bumpy Cities Pack by Yuril[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37950/?]Terrain Bump by SparrowPrince[/url] (overwrite Yuril Bumpy Cities with this one)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM by Brumbek[/url] (Overwrite both Yuril Bumpy Cities Pack and Terrain Bump)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39912/?]BBR - Big Bump Roads by Yuril[/url](overwrite all with this one)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40512/?]Project Parallax Remastered by Osmodius[/url] (Overwrite both Yuril Bumpy Cities ,Terrain Bump, BBR and SMIM with this one)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48227/?]HD Detailed Terrain by Soolie[/url] (overwrite all with this one)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19446/?]The Skyrim Distance Overhaul LOD Improvement by Grieche[/url] (Overwrite all with this one)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24364/?]AOF HD Tree LODs by AnOldFriend[/url] (Overwrite all with this one)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40564/?]SkyFalls and SkyMills - Animated Distant Waterfalls and WindMills by SjoertJansen[/url] (Overwrite other mods)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7588/?]Hot Torch by yuril[/url]
[url=http://enbdev.com/enbseries/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1930&p=43226&sid=16ef04dd0b34532cf36318ccaa3e6dae#p43226]Horizon extended sky mesh by --JawZ--[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50305/?]SSME - Skyrim Startup Memory Editor by Queue[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25370/?]SkyRealism - Grass[/url]
(expect a performance hit with this mod, although it is the best performing grass density mod out)

[color=#008000][b]INSTALLATION:[/b][/color]
=============
1. DELETE any leftover, like the EFFECT.TXT file located in skyrim folder if you are coming from a different ENB config.. Disable any other Grapical mod: CoT, RLFX, etc. this config is meant to be used with Vanilla game, nothing more is supported at this time. However, feel free to experiment.

2. Copy all the files to your Skyrim directory (where TESV.exe is located), click yes if asked to overwrite. Don't forget to put the ENB binary file here as well.

3. Edit the next lines inside "SkyrimPrefs.ini" located in "C:Users********DocumentsMy GamesSkyrim" to look like this:

iBlurDeferredShadowMask=1
fGamma=1.0000
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bDeferredShadows=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

4. Open the enblocal.ini file and change this line VideoMemorySizeMb=2000 to the size of your video card ram.

[color=#008000][b]TIPS AND TWEAKS:[/b][/color]
=============
By default, I have luma sharpen enabled through SweetFX. If you don't care for the luma sharpening, you can either turn it off in game by pressing Scroll Lock. Or you can open the SweetFX Settings file and turn it off by changing the 1 to a 0.

If you find performance is still to heavy, try opening the ENB GUI in game by presssying Shift+Enter and change DetailedShadowQuality to either High, Medium or Low. Don't forget to save and apply the changes.

If you don't care for the default Depth Of Field, I have included some other Depth of Field files. Just copy and paste which ever one you prefer and rename it to enbeffectprepass.fx
The Opethfeldt one is probably the easiest on the eyes and offers the most playability. The next is probably Kyo's or Polo's.

If you want to see a more extreme miniature effect, open enbeffectprepass.fx and change this line
from 0 to 1 or 2.
#define DEPTH_OF_FIELD_QULITY 0

I [b]HIGHLY RECOMMEND[/b] you do the black levels tweak to get the proper look for this ENB. I created a tutorial on how to do this on my blog. [url=http://faroffmods.blogspot.com/p/tips-and-tricks.html]Far Off Mods[/url]

I prefer using this config when centering the camera behind the character at all times. This is just my preference. If you would like to try this out. Simply open your Skyim.ini file and copy and paste this into the bottom and save.

[Camera] <------Optional for 3rd person centered Camera, and looser turning (so the cam is not so 'fixed' behind the player as it moves), and instant POV switching. To use, remove the Semicolons.
;fOverShoulderCombatAddZ=0.0000
fOverShoulderCombatAddY=0.0000
;fOverShoulderCombatAddX=0.0000
fOverShoulderCombatPosZ=0.0000
;fOverShoulderCombatPosY=0.0000
fOverShoulderCombatPosX=0.0000
fOverShoulderPosZ=0.0000
;fOverShoulderPosY=0.0000
fOverShoulderPosX=0.0000
;fOverShoulderHorseAddY=0.0000
;fOverShoulderHorsePosZ=0.0000
;fOverShoulderHorsePosX=0.0000
;fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=60.0000
;f1st3rdSwitchDelay=0.9500
;fChaseCameraSpeed=4.9000
author: far327
